The head of the World Health Organization is calling for greater global equity in COVID-19 vaccinations, saying rich countries need to share vaccines with poor countries.
 
Addressing a WHO executive board meeting in Geneva Monday, executive director Dr.

articles.author: Thomson Reuters Foundation
articles.title: WHO expects to have access to Pfizer vaccine "very soon... - Thomson Reuters Foundation
articles.description: HEALTH-CORONAVIRUS/WHO-VACCINES (URGENT, TV):WHO expects to have access to Pfizer vaccine "very soon"
articles.content: GENEVA, Jan 18 (Reuters) - The World Health Organization is in advanced negotiations with Pfizer about including the company's COVID-19 vaccine in the agency's portfolio of shots to be shared with po… [+490 chars]

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Hacked emails allegedly detail how EU drug regulator was pressured to approve Pfizer jab despite ‘problems’ with the vaccine - RT
articles.description: An alleged cache of email exchanges between EU officials and the European Medicines Agency show that the drug regulator was uncomfortable about fast-tracking approval for the Pfizer and Moderna Covid jabs, Le Monde has reported.
articles.content: The EMA has claimed that the contents of the messages, which were obtained by hackers and published on the dark web, were tampered with in order to undermine confidence in the drugs, without providin… [+3353 chars]
